title: North Carolina COVID-19 Information
cleaned_text: North Carolina COVID-19 Information Long COVID: Brooke's Story Living with long COVID can seriously disrupt your day-to-day life. Brooke has been suffering from symptoms for months after her infection and has not yet returned to her normal self. [Learn more about long COVID](/long-covid) Need Help? Dial 800-232-4636 (TTY 888-232-6348) Dial 9-1-1 in case of emergency
